amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that the Puerto Rican people would have the option to choose "none of the above" with regard to the status of Puerto Rico.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-468 to provide the Puerto Rican people have the option to choose "none of the above" with regard to the status of Puerto Rico.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gutierrez amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 236 (Roll no. 235).
